TA@v {1}x x x A {1}ia-u₂-ta-aʾ x x x IGI DINGIR-MEŠ KUR-aš-šur DINGIR-MEŠ {KUR}qi-id-ri DU₃-šu₂-nu aš-šur {d}NIN.LIL₂ {d}še-ru-u-a pit-ti ša₂ {1}ia-u₂-ta-aʾ la MUN-a-nu pi-i GIR₂.AN.BAR a-na ha-lu-qi o {KUR}a-ru-bu gab-bu id-din-u-ni o ina pi-i GIR₂.AN.BAR iš-kun-u-ka-nu-ni {1}aš-šur-DU₃-A MAN KUR-aš-šur EN-ku-nu I₃.GIŠ iš-kun-ak-ka-nu-u-ni pa-ni-šu₂ SIG₅-MEŠ ina UGU-hi-ku-nu iš-kun-u-ni šum-ma at-tu-nu TA@v {1}ia-u₂-ta-aʾ a-na MUN ta-qar-rib-a-ni šum-ma TA ŠEŠ-MEŠ-ku-nu ŠEŠ-ME-AD-MEŠ-ku-nu ŠEŠ-ME-AD-MEŠ-ku-nu x x x x+x tu KUR x x x x x x x x x+x is x x x x x at-tu-nu x x x x x x x šum-ma GIR₃.2-šu₂ x x x x x x x x i-da-tu-uš-šu i-da-tu-uš-šu x x x x x x x ina ŠU.2 me-me-ni ta-šap-par-a-ni-šu₂-ni ina pu-ut sa-an-ka-a-te ša₂ e-pu-šu-u-ni ina UGU du-a-ki-šu₂ la ta-kap-pu-da-a-ni la ta-ṣar-rim-a-ni {d}aš-šur {d}NIN.LIL₂ {d}30 {d}UTU {d}EN {d}PA {d}15 ša₂ NINA{KI} {d}15 ša arba-il₃ {d}U.GUR x+x x x x x x x x x+x+x x x x
